Àtụ:Infobox building
Kings Tower (nke bụbu Kingsway Tower) bụ ụlọ elu nwere okpukpu iri na ise nke a na-eji eme ihe dị iche iche nke dị na njikọ na Alfred Rewane Road, Ikoyi, Lagos. Ọ bụ ndị South African architects SAOTA mepụtara ya ma Sky View Towers Limited mepụtara ya. Ụlọ ahụ nwere okpukpu iri na abụọ nke oghere ọfịs na-agafe ihe karịrị 14,827 m2 (159,600 sq ft), okpukpu abụọ nke ogige mkpọsa na-ekpuchi ihe dịka 1,545 m2 (16,630 ft) (ngụkọta ebe nke 32,800 m2 (353,000 ft), ala na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala (atọ n'elu ọkwa na otu n'okpuru ọkwa) maka ihe dị ka ụgbọala narị atọ na ịrị anọ na atọ
Ihe owuwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na kọfị
